Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Merging Foreman Installer and Katello Installer

Ewoud Kohl van Wijngaarden

Currently we have Foreman Installer and Katello Installer builds on that. This leads to duplicated efforts and divergent behavior. We'll go over what the differences are, how we intend to solve the problem and how far we've come.

About Speaker

Ewoud has been a long time (upstream) installer maintainer. Recently he joined Red Hat where hes working on the downstream installer as well.
